name: Stopover Carvoeira Motorhome

title: (2550) Ariero - Unnamed Road

It's right next to a vast amount of antennas (ref highest point for miles), doesn't bother us but It'd look nicer without them. Opportunity to hike or bike to surrounding areas, no shade or services, easy road access, lots of space with relatively flat parking.

title: (2600) Alhandra - 115 N10

title_short: (2580) Parque de Campismo Rural da Serra de Montejunto

title: (2550) - Unnamed Road

title_short: (2615-097) Alverca do Ribatejo - 11 Rua César Augusto Gonçalves Ferreira

There are a lot of shops nearby: restaurants, banks, shops, Lidl, etc ... Could possibly serve as an alternative to visiting Lisbon by public transport, including train.

title: (2615) Alverca do Ribatejo - 129 Rua António Sérgio
title_short: (2615) Alverca do Ribatejo - 129 Rua António Sérgio

title: (2565) Maxial - 1 Rua Bartolomeu Perestrelo

title: (2615) Alverca do Ribatejo - R. Irene Lisboa
title_short: (2615) Alverca do Ribatejo - R. Irene Lisboa
description: Public park. No forbidden signs. Train station next. 15/20 minutes till Lisbon center by train.

title: (2120-097) Salvaterra de Magos - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area by the lake, with a river running to the next town. Very quiet. Here you could also spend a quiet night. Please take your rubbish with you as there are no rubbish bins.

name: Le Jasmin Etoilé
title: (2070-352) Le Jasmin Etoilé
description: 2-3 places for camper or caravan. Water, electricity, cassette and gray water evacuation, sink. Shops nearby: grocery store, fruit and vegetables, bar. Once a week: butcher and fishmonger. Cash machine. Pets accepted. If booking a minimum of one week, we take you to the supermarket for free for your purchases. Possibility to rent a kitchen tent with two pieces of furniture and an induction hob for a minimum of one week.

title: (2135) Samora Correia - 13 Rua dos Operários Agricolas
title_short: (2135) Samora Correia - 13 Rua dos Operários Agricolas
description:
Large parking space close to the cultural center, piscine and cemetery. Calm during the night. Light posts running the whole night.
Nothing special just a easy parking spot for a night.

title: (2590) - 10 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Personal park for 5/6 motorhomes. We have friendly dogs. PLEASE CALL BEFORE ARRIVING.

title: (2070-397) Pontével - 13 Largo do Rio da Fonte
title_short: (2070-397) Pontével - 13 Largo do Rio da Fonte

Maintenance area next to the Pontével river beach.

title: (2120) Salvaterra de Magos -
description: Nice riverside beach, with picnic tables and barbecue spots.

title: (2130) Benavente -
description: Nice place just outside of a village and right next to a fairground. Directly on the river with a path that invites you to take a long walk. Plenty of space for several, even larger, mobiles. The place is level. Access should be via the town center. The night was very quiet and lonely.

title: (2665-307) Milharado - R. Anselmo Manuel Carreira
description: Nice little park to eat! It's clean, there's shade and a small cafe next door if needed.

title: (2130) Benavente - N118

name: Cais da Vala Real

title: (2120-092) Salvaterra de Magos - 201 N118

Inside town so several shopping and supermarket around. If you like bullfighting, here is main event; also works with hawks (search “Falcoaria Real”). The area is safe but noisy mainly in working days as just aside main road and also main roundpoint with many trucks traffic. For quiet overnight, choose “Cais da Vala Real” near small marina (1,2 km N top of town).

title: (2130) Benavente - N118
description: Lavanteria, wash and dry at intermarche.

title_short: (2550-368) DaMinhaCasa Park - Cadaval - Rua fonte do Telheiro - Murteira

title: (2565-814) - 1 Travessa da Casa Paroquial

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - Barro

title: (2560-683) Torres Vedras - Rua Villenave d`Ornon

title: (2660) Santo Antão do Tojal -

Place to spend the night next to a park surrounded by nature. The area is level, shaded and silent. The park has many activities in nature for children and adults with zip lines and steps between trees.

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - R. São Gonçalo de Lagos
title_short: (2560) Torres Vedras - R. São Gonçalo de Lagos
description: Large gravelled car park. No motorhome ban. No service. Calm aspect during the day. Lots of parked cars. Easy access even to large vehicles.

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - Barro
description: Very good and quiet park. Next to the Expotorres. There are no services, there is a bar and other shopping areas around. A 5-minute walk from the City Center. Great for visiting the city, the Castle and other attractions. Very good to park during Carnival. Great park area near Expotorres. No services. Only parking. Quiet and near by the town center, 5 minutes walk.

title: (2670) Fanhões -
description: Small spot at the top of a plateau. Be careful it climbs hard and with the stones it skids but there is a parking lot at the top with a handicapped place. Quiet night, waking up in the morning with hunters in the distance and a few passages of quads. Nice view, especially at night with the lights of the surrounding towns, despite the wind turbines in the distance.

title: (2670) Fanhões - Rua da Sociedade Recreativa
description: Several locations available on dirt roads in good condition therefore passable. Set back from the road so very quiet.

title: (2120-013) Salvaterra de Magos -
description: Great place between a field and a river. Ideal for a day or a night in the middle of nature. 10 min walk from a small restaurant and boat trip along the river. Very beautiful sunset.

title: (2560-629) Torres Vedras - Rua Forte São Vicente
title_short: (2560-629) Torres Vedras - Rua Forte São Vicente

title: (2670) Lousa -

title: (2550) Cadaval - 20 Rua das Castanholas

title: (2070-516) Valada - 55 Rua Primeiro de Maio

Tourism and leisure area. Farm animals, organic gardens, comun kitchen and living room... Our door is closed because the animals are loose on the place. You have a doorbell on the gate. Wish you a wonderful trip!

title: (2550-012) Alguber - R. Mapril Fogaca

title: (2560) Ponte do Rol - 69 N9

You can go by camper and park on some grass next to the road at the bridge where you can walk across to the town where there is a play park for kids.  very quiet and peaceful. No facilities. if you are into hiking there is a trail here too.

title: (2005) - Autoestrada do Norte
description: Simple subdivision with its parking spaces in a deserted artisanal area that has never found its customers. Valid for resting only with a slight noise from the motorway at night, intensifying with the traffic in the morning. Illuminated at night, no car passing. The places are flat or almost with a cycle track and pedestrian that the grass tries to take again…. Very large motorhomes can park without problem. No shade in summer.

title: (2560) Torres Vedras - 100 Rua Francisco Pombo Sobrinho

title_short: (2560) Ponte do Rol - 5 Rua das Adegas

title: (2560-135) Ponte do Rol - 15 Largo Alvaro da Ponte
title_short: (2560-135) Ponte do Rol - 15 Largo Alvaro da Ponte

title: (2540) Bombarral -
description: (ASA de BOMBARRAL) - free service area with overnight parking for ten motorhomes (some shadows, others not) about 200 m behind the hypermarket Modelo/Continente. Quiet and safe place, with 250 m flat pedestrian access to city center (crossing railway line) and traditional grossery and municipal market. Several supermarkets around, municipal forest in city, tourist office, railway station (line to Lisboa), municipal museum, library and theater; kart race. In surrounding, ex-libris garden “Jardim Buddha Éden", in Quinta dos Louridos farm (to which there is also pedestrian access from parking through two trails and agricultural fields. Several wine farms (Quintas dos Louridos, do Sanguinhal, das Cerejeiras and da Granja) where taste is possible. Feel at home and in a family atmosphere!...

title: (2640-317) Igreja Nova - 135 N9
description:
A small picknick spot. many tables and lots of shade under the trees. Small toilet building and a working watertap.
Toilets are of French type (hole in ground) 
Trashcans available at street front.
Many stone bbq spots available, bring your own steel grill grate though.

title: (2640-410) Mafra - 17 Rua Francisco Augusto Leite

title: (2120-194) Foros de Salvaterra -

title: (1990-513) Lisboa - n.º 1 Rua Chen He
description: Perfect for visiting Lisbon, spent 3 nights there easily, it's quiet. Good alternative to the parking lot next door under the bridge, where a lot of people hang out at the weekend. Bus stop directly at the parking lot. Completely free on weekday nights and Saturday-Sunday.

title: (2640) Mafra - 10 Rua Santa Casa Misericórdia

title: (1990) Lisboa - Caminho das Cegonhas

title: (1990) Sacavém - Passeio do Teja
description: Large parking lot without lines. flat and sunny. we stayed 3 months, it does not bother anyone, we were safe and it's calm. Very close fountain, and garbage cans collected every day. very clean and well maintained park. if you are at the bottom of the parking lot, you can receive the tennis wifi. bus line 708 at the foot of the parking lot to reach the metro. BE CAREFUL for the route, put the roundabout otherwise the gps will take you over the bridge !! by 12m bus KarasGo family route's

title: (1990) Sacavém - Passeio dos Heróis do Mar
title_short: (1990) Sacavém - Passeio dos Heróis do Mar

Very clean

name: Camping Star Club

title: (1990-385) Lisboa - N10 Passeio dos Jacarandás
description: Good place to spend the night. Very shady. Very quiet bar. Some supermarket nearby. Right next to the Teixo River promenade, where you can picnic, walk, do some exrcise...Riverfront restaurants 10-15 min away on foot.

title: (2560) São Pedro da Cadeira - 19 Rua Casal do Feno
title_short: (2560) São Pedro da Cadeira - 19 Rua Casal do Feno
description: Toilets, drinkable water and showers. The showers looks like they can be closed and the toilets and shower were closed at 9pm but open during the day. It's a really clean spot but too much light at night to sleep

title: (1990) Lisboa - Travessa Sindbad O Marinheiro

title: (2005) - N365
description: Water source to top up. don't know if it's drinkable

title: (2640) Encarnação - Rua do Caldeirão
description: A place in the apple trees near a cemetery. It's not the best place in the world. But we were already at the picnic area in town and realized that it was just a parking lot in front of a house. Here we are close to the road but the noise is imperceptible in the van. in October we saw no one and were not disturbed.

description: Know one of the best machines that we have found in Portugal very attractive prices

title: (2530) Reguengo Grande - 26 N247-1
description: Service area in Reguengo Grande village, Lourinhã county, offers free full service for maintenance, located in the Town Picnic Park. Interesting to visit the "Ishmael Tasca" bar where is served the best “ginginha” (cerise liquor) of the region.

title: (2715-727) Montelavar - 14 Largo do Rossio
description: Public parking space across the street from a church. It only fits smaller vans though (max.6m) approx. 400ms away is a water fountain with drinking water, a small super market and a tiny Café. You can do nice hike to a small waterfall

title: (2640-453) Mafra - 9 Rua Professor Armindo Ayres de Carvalho

title: (2715-719) Montelavar - 18 Rua Professor Rosa Génio Alves
title_short: (2715-719) Montelavar - 18 Rua Professor Rosa Génio Alves
description: Village water point. Super clean, several taps

title: (2620-267) Ramada - 3 Rua Comandante Sacadura Cabral
description: Stayed here and it was fine. The street is noisy but the place is free and also good for visiting Lisbon.

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 45 Rua do Sol
title_short: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 45 Rua do Sol
description:
We offer space for campervans & motorhomes in a natural, peaceful and silent environment. We respect people, animals and nature.

At Lugar do Sol we live in an ecological, sustainable and self-sufficient way, energy comes from the sun, water comes from our well, we have a biological garden and we produce cosmetics and natural detergents.

In the shared areas, there is: a dry bathroom with hot shower, shared kitchen, our biological garden, a small swimming pool that delights the kids and adults, an area for the little ones and all the space to disconnect from everyday life, relax and meditate.

We have 3 dogs, chickens, ducks, fishes, frogs etc. and more animals are welcome.

Equipment available for fun: surfboard, bikes and tools for minor repairs. 

We also have a caravan and a small sustainable house available for rent. Built with recycled glass bottles, straw, lime, old wood and lots of love.)

Contact us if you want to know more about our projects and how you can participate.

Please contact in advance to confirm availability.

To find us follow the GPS and look for a Bambu gate.

We have special prices for long stays!

Enjoy!

title: (2540) Delgada - N8
description: Nice picnic area with trees close to the road. With 9 tables

title: (2640) Encarnação - 20 Rua do Moinho
description: Convenient parking for campers and vans. very close to the most famous surfing beaches. (ERICEIRA) reservations by email

title: (2540-590) Roliça - Rua do Picoto
description: Wonderful view of the valley at 180 °, quiet and surrounded by nature, unpaved road without exit but with the possibility of turning back, wide lane no problem for large motorhome, no equipment, 6 places see more

title: (2560) Silveira - 17 EM830
description: Place for pic nic with a few tables

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - Praia do Seixo
title_short: (2560) A dos Cunhados - Praia do Seixo
description: Very quiet place between the pines with many places (more than 10 in my opinion). During the day there are a lot of people who come to eat under the pines but it remains very calm, at the end of the afternoon everyone leaves, we were 2 vans and 1 motorhome. Accessible for all types of vehicles, in the area you will not find anything better, especially when it comes to shelter from the wind !! ;)

title: (2560) Praia de Santa Cruz, Torres Vedras - N247 camping Santa Cruz
title_short: (2560) Praia de Santa Cruz, Torres Vedras - N247 camping Santa Cruz
description: The beach camping santa cruz, can drain the cassete and gray water for free and fill the drinking water against payment. Parking possible, according to the price of the campsite. Please go to the reception

address.city: Praia de Santa Cruz, Torres Vedras

title: (2040) Malaqueijo - 17 Rua dos Combatentes do Ultramar
title_short: (2040) Malaqueijo - 17 Rua dos Combatentes do Ultramar

title_short: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 41 Avenida Doutor Joaquim Jacinto
description: Parking facing the sea with cars, direct access to the beach

title: (2560) - Avenida Doutor Joaquim Jacinto
description: Great place for parking near the beach

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - N247
description: Location rather isolated on the heights of the cliffs with access to a low-frequented beach. splendid landscape. source a few meters from the camp

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 84 Rua do Navio
title_short: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 84 Rua do Navio
description:
New parking for motorhomes where overnight stays are explicitly authorized.
As of today (July 7, 2023) it seems to be finishing to enable the area but already indicated.
It is a parking shared with other vehicles and slightly inclined, but with nice views

title: () A dos Cunhados - Rua da Colónia
title_short: () A dos Cunhados - Rua da Colónia
description: A small but super private parking spot with an easy access to the beach, great view and organic farm in a 5 minute walk.

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 6B Rua da Oliveirinha
title_short: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 6B Rua da Oliveirinha
description:
Beach car park on top of a big cliff. Overlooking a beautiful beach with big waves. 
Drive past big green houses to get there.. But guess with all the sea breeze and staying only one night yiu won't get diseased permanently by the pesticides..

title: (2560) Santa Cruz - 20 Rua A-Ver-O-Mar
description: Above the cliff, quiet parking because no beach in the immediate vicinity, a little north another parking lot at the end of a track with excellent toilets, but less view. South of Santal Cruz, 2 car parks at the top of the cliffs. Very fun mountain biking from the car park to St Rita via the paragliding spot and plenty of parkings in the countryside.

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 30 Rua A-Ver-O-Mar
description: Point to see the sea and the Berlenga island.

title: (2675-369) Odivelas - 18 Rua Augusto Alexandre Jorge
description: Good for a visit to Lisbon near the metro Just opposite the fire station. Children's park next door

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados - 5 Rua A-Ver-O-Mar
description:
Great spot for night, we have been here off season and it was all empty. Summer can be crowdy I guess.
Ocean view, beach just there. Showers even in off season. Good waves, nobody in water.

title: (2640) Cheleiros - R. do Cemitério
description: Cemetery car park, on asphalt. Perfect for a stop in the shade of the trees. Place out of sight, calm, despite the barking in the distance like everywhere in Portugal.

title: (2560) - Estrada do Hotel Golf Mar
description: Small Camping spot on the Coastline with a great view. Not too exposed and quiet in the night. Narrow trails along the Coastline are perfectly suitable for mountainbiking. Approach over "Estr. Do Hotel Golf Mar"

title: (2560) torres vedras - 12 Avenida do Atlântico Praia de Santa Cruz
title_short: (2560) torres vedras - 12 Avenida do Atlântico Praia de Santa Cruz
description: Parking, to avoid in summer during the day. Great ocean view beach for surfing. Very good from September to June.

address.street: 12 Avenida do Atlântico Praia de Santa Cruz

title: (2560) A dos Cunhados -
description: Good spot close to The beach

title: (1700) Lisboa - Rua A
description: Parking P6 long duration. Underground and open air. We stayed here for 2 nights. Ideal to party in Lisbon without worrying about our van and return early in the morning with the first metro or night bus 208 leaving Cais de Sobré. Toilets and catering at the airport (3 min walk)

title: (2560-490) Silveira - 4 Rua General Humberto Delgado
description: Large gravel car park set back from Praia de Santa Cruz, with signal for motorhome parking and stay overnight.

title: (1700-111) Lisboa - Av. Berlim
description: P3 guarded car park with flat and shaded spaces. No problem with our 3m high van. 15 euros for 24 hours. Metro for Lisbon 5 minutes walk from the car park for 1.50e. Beware of many thefts in broad daylight of motorhomes on car parks at 3 euros without surveillance.

title: (2530-656) Ribamar - 6 Estrada da Cardinha
description: Great and quiet place to sleep. We stayed here for one night with 4 other campers. There is enough space for 3 mobile homes and 2 smaller cars. There is a steep and narrow path to the beach (we managed it easily with a 4 year old) or a 10 minute flight of stairs. Proper bathing is only possible at low tide due to the high waves. Nevertheless, a very nice beach that is not overcrowded.

title: (1800) Lisboa - Estrada de São Cornélio
description: Parking near the cemetery, perfect for overnight, very quiet, in the morning park cars from the offices, is 15 minutes walk from the oceanarium. In the park of the nations.

title: (2640) Encarnação - 50 N247
description: Large self-service launderette with WiFi and a socket (charge cell phone or similar). Pleasantly scented washing powder and parking spaces right in front of the door. Washing result satisfactory to good.
